mapper.select: select a.name, count(b.id) as value from b_category a left join b_article b on a.id=b.category_id GROUP BY a.id

select a.id,a.name,a.sort,a.create_time,a.click_volume,a.avatar,a.boutique,b.articleCount from b_category a left join (select category_id,count(id) as articleCount from b_article group by category_id) b on a.id=b.category_id
a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
select b.id, b.name, b.avatar, count(a.id) as articleCount from b_category b left join b_article a on a.category_id = b.id group by b.id order by b.sort desc
